project_abstract.cdata: The main objectives of the Second Western Savannah Development Project are to (a) increase small farmer incomes through higher production of grain and pulses by making available farm inputs and water supplies; (b) extend new technology either identified under Western Savannah Project I or to be developed under Western Savannah Project II; (c) increase output from livestock by creating an effective veterinary service; (d) conserve range and develop pasture; (e) adapt farming systems to arrest the ongoing degradation of soil and range; and (f) introduce land tenure.
